text: Thiago Henrique Mendes Ribeiro (born 15 March 1992) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for French club Lyon. ==Career== ===Lille=== On 8 July 2017, Ligue 1 side Lille OSC announced the signing of Mendes on a five-year contract. The transfer fee was reported as "worth up to €9 million" after being signed by Head Coach Marcelo Bielsa. ===Lyon=== On 3 July 2019, Mendes signed with Ligue 1 side Olympique Lyonnais. ==Career
